  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1248</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Teshuva: A Discussion Guide1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Teshuva: Eine Diskussion Guide1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Teshuva : Une Discussion Guide1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Teshuva: Uma Discussão Guide1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Teshuva: Una Discussione Guide1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Teshuva: Μια συζήτηση Guide1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Teshuva: Una Discusión Guide1</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This discussion guide explores the Jewish approach to repentance, drawing on Rambam’s Hilchot Teshuvah. Included are hands-on activities for younger and older learners that deal with guilt and apology.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lesson plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">apology scenarios</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">repentance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Rambam’s Hilchot Teshuvah.</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Diskussion Anleitung erforscht die 
jüdische Annäherung zum repentance und zeichnet auf Rambam?s Hilchot
Teshuvah. Sind Blindeinschub Aktivitäten für die jüngeren und
älteren Anfänger enthalten, die Schuld und Entschuldigung 
beschäftigen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce guide de discussion explore l'approche juive 
au repentir, dessinant sur Rambam?s Hilchot Teshuvah. Incluses
sont les activités à commande manuelle pour de plus jeunes et plus 
âgés étudiants qui traitent la culpabilité et les excuses.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta guia da discussão explora a aproximação 
jewish ao repentance, desenhando em Rambam?s Hilchot Teshuvah. 
Incluídas são as atividades hands-on para uns learners mais 
novos e mais velhos que tratem da culpa e do apology.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa guida di discussione esplora il metodo 
ebreo al repentance, dissipante su Rambam?s Hilchot Teshuvah. 
Incluse sono le attività hands-on per i principianti più 
giovani e più anziani che si occupano di guilt e delle scuse.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτός ο οδηγός συζήτησης ερευνά την εβραϊκή 
προσέγγιση στη μεταμέλεια, επισύροντας την προσοχή σε Rambam?s 
Hilchot Teshuvah. Περιλαμβάνονται οι εμπράγματες 
δραστηριότητες για τους νεώτερους και παλαιότερους αρχαρίους που 
εξετάζουν την ενοχή και τη συγγνώμη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta guía de la discusión explora el 
acercamiento judío al repentance, trazando en Rambam?s Hilchot 
Teshuvah. Incluidas son las actividades con manos para 
principiantes más jóvenes y más viejos que se ocupen de 
culpabilidad y de apología.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektionplan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Entschuldigung Drehbücher</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">repentance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rambam?s Hilchot Teshuvah.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">plan de leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">scénarios d'excuses</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">repentir</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Rambam?s Hilchot Teshuvah.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">planta da lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">scenarios do apology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">repentance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Rambam?s Hilchot Teshuvah.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">programma di lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">piani d'azione di scuse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">repentance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rambam?s Hilchot Teshuvah.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σενάρια συγγνώμης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μεταμέλεια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Rambam?s Hilchot Teshuvah.</string>
          </keyword>
